app.title: TaroFlash
app.description: A warm little space to learn, make, and collect things you love.
app.footer.description: TaroFlash is an SRS flashcard app with deck management, rich card editing, and spaced-repetition scheduling.
phone.apps.logout.title: Logout
phone.apps.logout.description: Are you sure you want to logout?
signup-dialog.plan-desc: TaroFlash is designed, built, and maintained by just one person! Choosing a paid plan helps to support the future of the project!
signup-dialog.free-plan.card-limit: Add up to 100 Cards per Deck
signup-dialog.alert.generic-message: Look's like something might have gone wrong. Please try again.
welcome-view.build-decks-desc: Build your cards with a simple, flexible editor. Add background colors, images, and simple formatting to make your cards easier to read, easier to remember, and nicer to look at while you study.
welcome-view.study-decks-desc: Study your decks in calm, focused sessions designed to help you stay present. Review cards at your own pace, repeat what matters, and make steady progress without feeling rushed.
welcome-view.design-desc: Taroflash is designed to feel calm, clear, and comfortable. Soft colors, simple layouts, and thoughtful compositions create a space where it’s easy to focus, easy to learn, and easy to come back.
member-application.subtitle: Let’s get you set up with your new Member Card (You can update this at any time).

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy-policy.intro: TaroFlash respects your privacy and is committed to handling user data transparently and responsibly. This policy explains what information we collect, how it is used, and how it is stored.
privacy-policy.section-1.title: Information We Collect
privacy-policy.section-1.subsection-1.co: When you create an account, TaroFlash collects the following information:
privacy-policy.section-1.subsection-1.fo: This information is required to create and manage your account.
privacy-policy.section-1.subsection-2.co: If you choose to sign in using Google, TaroFlash accesses the following Google user data:
privacy-policy.section-1.subsection-2.it: Basic profile information (name and profile image)
privacy-policy.section-1.subsection-2.fo: TaroFlash only requests non-sensitive scopes (email and userinfo.profile) for authentication purposes.
privacy-policy.section-2.title: How We Use Your Information
privacy-policy.section-2.content: Your information is used only to:
privacy-policy.section-2.item-2: Display account-related information within the app
privacy-policy.section-2.item-3: Provide core app functionality such as deck management and study sessions
privacy-policy.section-2.item-4: Support account recovery and communication related to your account
privacy-policy.section-2.footer: Your data is not used for advertising or marketing purposes.
privacy-policy.section-3.title: Data Storage and Security
privacy-policy.section-3.item-1: User data is securely stored using Supabase.
privacy-policy.section-3.item-2: TaroFlash does not store Google access tokens.
privacy-policy.section-3.item-3: Authentication sessions are handled securely by our authentication provider.
privacy-policy.section-3.item-4: Payment-related data is processed securely by Stripe; TaroFlash does not store full payment details.
privacy-policy.section-3.item-5: Reasonable technical and organizational measures are used to protect user data from unauthorized access.
privacy-policy.section-4.title: Data Sharing
privacy-policy.section-4.content-1: TaroFlash does not sell or rent user data.
privacy-policy.section-4.content-2: User data is shared only with the following service providers, solely to operate the app:
privacy-policy.section-4.item-1: Supabase — authentication, database, and backend infrastructure
privacy-policy.section-4.item-2: Stripe — payment processing for paid plans
privacy-policy.section-4.footer: No user data is shared with advertisers.
privacy-policy.section-5.title: Future Social Features
privacy-policy.section-5.content: TaroFlash may introduce optional social features in the future, such as public profiles or shared decks. If these features are added, users will be clearly informed about what information is public and given control over their participation.
privacy-policy.section-6.title: Data Deletion
privacy-policy.section-6.content: Users may request deletion of their account and associated data at any time through the app or by contacting support.
privacy-policy.section-7.title: Changes to This Policy
privacy-policy.section-7.content: This privacy policy may be updated as the app evolves. Any changes will be reflected on this page.
privacy-policy.section-8.title: Contact
privacy-policy.section-8.content: If you have questions about this policy, you may contact us at:
terms-of-service.title: Terms of Service
terms-of-service.intro: By using TaroFlash, you agree to the following terms.
terms-of-service.section-1.title: Use of the Service
terms-of-service.section-1.content: TaroFlash provides a spaced-repetition flashcard application for personal study. You agree to use the service lawfully and as intended.
terms-of-service.section-2.title: Accounts
terms-of-service.section-2.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account. Account information must be accurate and up to date.
terms-of-service.section-3.title: User Content
terms-of-service.section-3.content-1: All study content you create remains yours. You grant TaroFlash permission to store and display this content as necessary to provide the service.
terms-of-service.section-3.content-2: Future features may allow users to share content publicly or with other users. Participation in such features will be optional.
terms-of-service.section-4.title: Payments
terms-of-service.section-4.content: Some features may require a paid subscription. Payments are processed securely by Stripe.
terms-of-service.section-5.title: Service Availability
terms-of-service.section-5.content: The service is provided "as is" and may change or evolve over time. We make no guarantees regarding uninterrupted availability.
terms-of-service.section-6.title: Termination
terms-of-service.section-6.content: Accounts may be suspended or deleted if these terms are violated.
terms-of-service.section-7.title: Changes to These Terms
terms-of-service.section-7.content: These terms may be updated periodically. Continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
